wikipedia_page.main: Clement Charlton Palmer (1871–1944) was a cathedral organist, who served at Canterbury Cathedral.

response: Organists and assistant organists at Canterbury Cathedral have included composers Clement Charlton Palmer, Gerald Hocken Knight and Philip Moore and musical directors Allan Wicks and Stephen Darlington. The acting organist and master of the choristers is David Newsholme and acting assistant organist is Adrian Bawtree.
* Clement Charlton Palmer (1871 in Barton - 1944) cathedral organist in Canterbury Cathedral from 1908 to 1936
*Clement Charlton Palmer 1897–1908 (then organist of Canterbury Cathedral)
